name: Pistachio-Crusted Sweet-Potato Balls
recipeIngredient: 8 medium sweet potatoes, cooked until just tender and peeled
1 1/2 cups shelled, unsalted pistachios, coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Coarsely mash the sweet potatoes. Stir in all ingredients except pistachios.
Form the sweet-potato mixture into balls, using a rounded tablespoon for each.
Lightly oil a baking sheet. Place in the bottom third of the oven for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, roll the potato balls in the pistachios to coat.
Place the balls on heated baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes.
